thread.title: Kim Kardashian has “Troop Beverly Hills’-themed baby shower
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian has “Troop Beverly Hills’-themed baby shower | Examiner.com

author: Victoria Miller
title: Kim Kardashian has “Troop Beverly Hills’-themed baby shower
text:
Play Kim Kardashian was sporting a rather dressed down look as she flashed her baby bump in striped pyjamas. But the glamorous star didn't wear her pj's out just to be comfortable she was in fancy dress for her baby shower with even little North West... on.aol.com Kim Kardashian had her baby shower one week after it was postponed due to brother-in-law Lamar Odon’s health crisis. The “Keeping With the Kardashians” star was feted by her siblings and pals on Oct. 25, according to Yahoo Celebrity on Sunday. And while the theme really had nothing to do with babies, it was definitely unique.
Photo by Frazer Harrison/Getty Images for Cosmopolitan Kardashian, who is expecting her second child, a baby boy, with husband Kanye West this December, was treated to a shower with a “Troop Beverly Hills” theme. All five of the famous sisters -- Kim, Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian and Kendall and Kylie Jenner, as well as Kim's daughter North West -- wore matching striped pajamas to the events. Decorations included teepees with “Troop 332, Beverly Hills, CA” signs on them, and camping gear. Girl Scout cookies were even served at the faux campout.
“Troop Beverly Hills” is a retro movie about a scout troop called the Wilderness Girls. The 1989 movie starred Shelley Long, Craig T. Nelson and a teen Tori Spelling, and Kardashian is reportedly a big fan of the flick.
While it was glamping more than camping, Kim Kardashian practically roughed it for her second baby shower. Her first shower, when she was pregnant with daughter North West in 2013, made headlines for its elaborate invitation. TMZ posted a pic of the expensive invite, which was delivered to guests via a real music box that featured a spinning ballerina dancing to Kanye’s song “Hey Mama.” The shower was a garden-themed breakfast buffet, and the Kardashian sisters dressed as garden goddesses for the garden chic event. But, let’s face it, the pajamas for shower No. 2 sound a whole lot comfier.
